workflow.name: Analyze stock sentiment with GPT-4o and create Asana tasks with Slack alerts
workflow.description:
![image 7.png](fileId:3893)
## üìò Description
 This workflow analyzes real-time stock market sentiment and intent from public social media discussions and converts those signals into operations-ready actions. It exposes a webhook endpoint where a stock-market‚Äìrelated query can be submitted (for example, a stock, sector, index, or market event). The workflow then scans Twitter/X and Instagram for recent public discussions that indicate buying interest, selling pressure, fear, uncertainty, or emerging opportunities.
An AI agent classifies each signal by intent type, sentiment, urgency, and strength. These insights are transformed into a prioritized Asana task for market or research teams and a concise Slack alert for leadership visibility. Built-in validation and error handling ensure reliable execution and fast debugging. This automation removes the need for manual social monitoring while keeping teams informed of emerging market risks and opportunities.
## ‚ö†Ô∏è Deployment Disclaimer
 This template is designed for self-hosted n8n installations only.
 It relies on external MCP tools and custom AI orchestration that are not supported on n8n Cloud.
## ‚öôÔ∏è What This Workflow Does (Step-by-Step)
- üåê Receive Stock Market Query (Webhook Trigger)
 Accepts an external POST request containing a stock market query.
- üßæ Extract Stock Market Query from Payload
 Normalizes and prepares the query for analysis.
- üîé Analyze Social Media for Stock Market Intent (AI)
 Scans public Twitter/X and Instagram posts to detect actionable market intent signals.
- üì° Social Intelligence Data Fetch (MCP Tool)
 Retrieves relevant social data from external intelligence sources.
- üß† Transform Market Intent Signals into Ops-Ready Actions (AI)
 Structures insights into priorities, summaries, and recommended actions.
- üßπ Parse Structured Ops Payload
 Validates and safely parses AI-generated JSON for downstream use.
- üìã Create Asana Task for Market Signal Review
 Creates a prioritized task with key signals, context, and recommendations.
- üì£ Send Market Risk & Sentiment Alert to Slack
 Delivers an executive-friendly alert summarizing risks or opportunities.
- üö® Error Handler ‚Üí Slack Alert
 Posts detailed error information if any workflow step fails.
## üß© Prerequisites
 ‚Ä¢ Self-hosted n8n instance
 ‚Ä¢ OpenAI and Azure OpenAI API credentials
 ‚Ä¢ MCP (Xpoz) social intelligence credentials
 ‚Ä¢ Asana OAuth credentials
 ‚Ä¢ Slack API credentials
## üõ† Setup Instructions
- Deploy the workflow on a self-hosted n8n instance
- Configure the webhook endpoint and test with a sample query
- Connect OpenAI, Azure OpenAI, MCP, Asana, and Slack credentials
- Set the correct Asana workspace and project ID
- Select the Slack channel for alerts
## üõ† Customization Tips
 ‚Ä¢ Adjust intent and sentiment classification rules in AI prompts
 ‚Ä¢ Modify task priority logic or due-date rules
 ‚Ä¢ Extend outputs to email reports or dashboards if required
## üí° Key Benefits
 ‚úî Real-time market sentiment detection from social media
 ‚úî Converts unstructured signals into actionable tasks
 ‚úî Provides leadership-ready Slack alerts
 ‚úî Eliminates manual market monitoring
 ‚úî Built-in validation and error visibility
## üë• Perfect For
 - Market research teams
 - Investment and strategy teams
 - Operations and risk teams
 - Founders and analysts tracking market sentiment

## üö® Error Handling 

 
Catches any workflow failure and posts an alert to Slack.  
Includes node name, error message, and timestamp for quick debugging.

nodes.name: Receive Stock Market Query Request (Webhook Trigger)
Extract Stock Market Query from Request Payload
Analyze Social Media for Stock Market Intent Signals (AI)

parameters.text:
=Analyze public social media discussions related to the following query:

"{{ $json.body.query }}"

Focus on understanding the current stock market sentiment and intent behind user discussions.

Return only actionable stock market intent signals based on public posts.

options.systemMessage:
You are a Stock Market Social Media Intent Analysis Agent.

Your role is to analyze public social media content using connected social intelligence tools and extract meaningful stock market intent.

SCOPE:
- Platforms: Twitter/X and Instagram (public posts only)
- Domain: Stock market, trading, investing, indices, sectors, stocks
- Timeframe: Recent / current discussions only

WHAT TO ANALYZE:
Identify posts where users:
1. Ask about current market status or sentiment
2. Discuss buying or selling stocks
3. Express fear, panic, losses, or uncertainty
4. Look for opportunities, rallies, or reversals
5. React to market news, events, or price movement
6. Ask for opinions or guidance on stocks or indices

IGNORE:
- Pure news headlines without opinion
- Educational or tutorial posts
- Promotions, ads, or influencer marketing
- Generic motivational or meme content
- Self-promotion or referral links

INTENT CLASSIFICATION:
- HIGH: Clear buy/sell intent, urgency, fear, or capital at risk
- MEDIUM: Researching, asking opinions, comparing views
- LOW: General discussion or curiosity

OUTPUT RULES:
- Use only publicly available data
- Do NOT invent private or personal data
- Do NOT include explanations outside JSON
- Return a maximum of 10 results
- If no meaningful signals exist, return an empty array []

OUTPUT FORMAT (STRICT JSON ONLY):
[
  {
    "platform": "Twitter|Instagram",
    "username": "public_handle",
    "post_text": "exact post excerpt (max 200 chars)",
    "market_context": "stock, index, sector, or event mentioned",
    "intent_type": "Buy|Sell|Fear|Opportunity|Research",
    "sentiment": "Bullish|Bearish|Neutral|Confused",
    "intent_strength": "High|Medium|Low",
    "urgency": "Yes|No",
    "key_insight": "why this post matters for market analysis"
  }
]

nodes.name: Social Intelligence Data Fetch Tool (MCP Client)
OpenAI Reasoning Engine for Market Intent Analysis
Transform Market Intent Signals into Ops-Ready Actions (AI)

options.systemMessage:
You are a data structuring and operations assistant.

Your task is to transform unstructured or narrative stock market social media insights into structured, machine-readable data for operations teams.

You MUST:
- Extract actionable insights only
- Normalize intent, sentiment, and urgency
- Prepare content suitable for task creation and executive reporting

OUTPUT REQUIREMENTS:
- Output ONLY valid JSON
- No markdown
- No explanations
- No extra text

LOGIC RULES:
1. Aggregate similar insights where possible
2. Determine overall market sentiment
3. Identify high-priority actions
4. Keep wording professional and concise
5. Optimize content for managers (not traders)

PRIORITY RULES:
- If any insight has intent_strength = High AND urgency = Yes ‚Üí Priority = High
- Else if mixed signals ‚Üí Priority = Medium
- Else ‚Üí Priority = Low

nodes.name: Azure OpenAI Reasoning Engine for Ops Structuring
Parse Structured Ops Payload from AI Output
Create Asana Task for Market Signal Review
Send Market Risk & Sentiment Alert to Slack

parameters.content:
## üìä Analyze Stock Market Social Media Sentiment using GPT-4o and Create Asana Tasks with Slack Alerts

### How it works
This workflow exposes a webhook endpoint that accepts a stock market‚Äìrelated query and analyzes real-time public social media discussions to identify meaningful market intent signals. Once triggered, the query is extracted and passed to an AI agent that scans Twitter/X and Instagram using connected social intelligence tools.

The AI identifies actionable signals such as buying interest, selling pressure, fear, uncertainty, or opportunity sentiment across stocks, indices, sectors, or market events. Each signal is classified by intent type, sentiment, urgency, and strength.

The extracted insights are then transformed into operations-ready outputs. A second AI agent structures the findings into a prioritized Asana task for the market research team and a concise executive-style alert for Slack. This enables fast awareness of emerging market risks or opportunities without manual monitoring.

### Setup steps
1. Configure the webhook URL as an input source.
2. Connect OpenAI and Azure OpenAI credentials.
3. Add MCP (Xpoz) social intelligence credentials.
4. Set the Asana workspace and project ID.
5. Select the Slack channel for alerts.
6. Test the webhook with a sample market query.

### Customization
- Adjust intent classification rules in the AI prompts.
- Change task priority logic or due dates.
- Extend outputs to email or dashboards if needed.

## Webhook Intake & Query Preparation
Receives external stock market queries and normalizes input for analysis.

## Social Market Signal Discovery
Analyzes public social media discussions to extract stock market intent, sentiment, and urgency signals.

## Ops-Ready Insight Transformation
Converts raw market signals into structured actions, priorities, and summaries for operations teams.

## Output Parsing & Validation
Safely parses and validates AI-generated structured JSON for downstream use.

## Distribution & Task Execution
Creates actionable Asana tasks and sends executive alerts to Slack.

user.name: Rahul Joshi
user.bio: Rahul Joshi is a seasoned technology leader specializing in the n8n automation tool and AI-driven workflow automation. With deep expertise in building open-source workflow automation and self-hosted automation platforms, he helps organizations eliminate manual processes through intelligent n8n ai agent automation solutions.

generic.label: How a digital strategist uses n8n for online marketing

data.details: In n8n, when a workflow execution fails, it can start another workflow. This second workflow can be any arbitrary workflow on your n8n instance. Use the Error Trigger node as your Trigger in the Error workflow.
